title: Field Crew Safety Monitoring
description: A dispatcher is monitoring the safety of a crew working near energized equipment.

tasks.description: The crew lead uses their mobile device to confirm they have completed the job briefing and donned all required personal protective equipment (PPE).
tasks.expected_outcome: System logs the completion of the safety checklist.

tasks.description: The system monitors the crew's location via GPS and alerts the dispatcher if they enter a hazardous zone without proper authorization.
The crew's wearable voltage detector sends an alarm to the dispatcher, indicating they are too close to an energized line.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dispatcher receives the proximity alarm and immediately contacts the crew.
